ResourceHeader.Description: ASY and SYM geomagnetic indices. The web site of WDC for Geomagnetism at Kyoto U., url given below, offers plots and numeric downloads for 1-minute ASY, SYM, and related indices. Values of ASY-D, ASY-H, SYM-D, and SYM-H are available from 1981 to within 1-2 months of current date. All ASY and SYM data are currently (as of 12/07/2011) marked as "provisional." Alternative sources of the WDC/Kyoto-generated ASY and SYM indices include the 1-min OMNI data set at NASA/GSFC/SPDF.

InformationURL.Name: Description of ASY and SYM
InformationURL.Description: Paper by T. Iyemori et al. on derivation of ASY and SYM indices, and on their relation to Dst and AE indices.

AccessURL.Name: WDC for Geomagnetism at Kyoto U.
AccessURL.Description: Multi-option path to AE and related indices at Kyoto, including index documentation and history files.

AccessURL.Name: OMNIWeb
AccessURL.Description: Path to 1-min OMNI data set for 1995 and later, with subset/plot/list functionalities, and to ftp accessibility.
